definition: older male cousin via female line
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: Can a first cousin at one remove inherit the property?
sentences.chinese: 在堂表兄弟姐妹这一辈当中，他是唯一的男孩。

sentences.english: Ida buried the flowers with her cousins.
sentences.chinese: 意达和她的表兄妹们把花埋了。

sentences.english: Is Cousin Lin visiting us for the weekend?
sentences.chinese: 林表兄周末来看我们吗？

sentences.english: My cousin Wesley, who is four years older than I, was the nearest I had to a brother.
sentences.chinese: 长我四岁的表兄韦斯利更象是我的一个亲哥哥。

sentences.english: Su and Wen are cousins with an age difference of twenty-two years.
sentences.chinese: 兩人为相差二十二岁之表兄弟，情真意切，知己知彼。

sentences.english: My cousin is not part of my nuclear household.
sentences.chinese: 我的堂表兄弟姊妹并否则核心家里成员的一部份。

sentences.english: I had a blast on New Year's Eve with my cousins.
sentences.chinese: 除夕夜那晚我和我的表兄妹们玩得很开心。

sentences.english: I had a cousin who worked in the U. S. Mint.
sentences.chinese: 我有个表兄弟在美国造币厂工作。

sentences.english: But she doesn't know that the butcher is her second cousin .
sentences.chinese: 但是她不知道那个屠夫是她二表兄。

sentences.english: According to Snyder, my cousin, Oswald mentioned this matter.
sentences.chinese: 根据我表兄斯奈德的叙述，奥斯瓦德提到过这件事。

sentences.english: He factored his cousin's estate for five years.
sentences.chinese: 他经管他表兄弟的财产有五年之久。

sentences.english: Police arrested another Hankton cousin in connection with that crime.
sentences.chinese: 警察逮捕了汉克顿另一个涉案表兄。

sentences.english: Wang Wei soon got time interested in cycling too.
sentences.chinese: 很快，王薇使表兄弟也对骑车旅游产生了兴趣。

sentences.english: He got to spend a week recently with his cousin that lives in Mexico too.
sentences.chinese: 他最近和他也住在墨西哥的表兄一起玩了一个星期。

definition: elder brother/term of respect for a man of about the same age
son of a male cousin via female line
father's elder brother/term of respect for older man/CL:個|个[ge4]
